applicant-name.name: 北京亿华通科技股份有限公司

invention-title: High-pressure gas-liquid separation tank for PEM water electrolysis hydrogen production and control method of high-pressure gas-liquid separation tank
一种PEM电解水制氢用的高压气液分离罐及其控制方法

abstract.p: The invention discloses a PEM water electrolysis hydrogen production high-pressure gas-liquid separation tank and a control method thereof. The PEM water electrolysis hydrogen production high-pressure gas-liquid separation tank comprises a tank body, a gas inlet is formed in one side end of the upper portion of the tank body, a gas outlet is formed in the top end of the tank body, and a baffling perforated plate is installed at the position, close to the gas inlet, in the tank body; according to the gas-liquid separation tank, high-pressure gas-liquid mixed gas enters the tank body from the gas inlet and is subjected to gas-liquid separation under the action of the baffling porous plate, gas is directly discharged from the gas outlet, and liquid flows downwards into the bottom of the tank body through the baffling porous plate to be stored. Hydrogen still has higher pressure when being discharged from the exhaust port, the energy consumption of subsequent hydrogen compression is reduced, the cost can be greatly reduced, and when the liquid level is lower than the protection liquid level, the protection liquid level electromagnetic valve is closed, and the liquid cannot be completely discharged from the liquid discharge port, so that a liquid sealing effect is achieved; and pollution to hydrogen due to the fact that air enters the tank body from the liquid outlet after the liquid is completely discharged is avoided.

本发明公开了一种PEM电解水制氢用的高压气液分离罐及其控制方法，包括罐体，所述罐体上部一侧端设置有进气口，所述罐体顶端设置有排气口，所述罐体内靠近进气口处安装有折流多孔板；高压气液混合气从进气口进入罐体，在折流多孔板的作用下进行气液分离，气体从排气口直接排出，液体经过折流多孔板向下流进罐体底部进行存液，本发明的气液分离罐中，罐体的结构设计简单，操作更加简单，氢气在排气口排出时仍具有较大的压力，降低后续氢气压缩的能耗，能够大大降低成本，当液位低于保护液位时，保护液位电磁阀关闭，液体不会完全从排液口排出，起到了液封的效果，避免了液体被完全排出后空气从排液口进入罐体对氢气造成的污染。
